column1: | chad dewayne moore. visitation: sunday june 14
column2: 2015 from 3-8pm at schmid funeral home. funeral: 1 pm monday june 15
column3: 2015 at schmid funeral home. interment: highland memory gardens. born: 1974-06-07. died: 2015-06-11. chad dewayne moore
column4: 41 of mt. washington passed away june 11
column5: 2015 surrounded by his family. chad was a member of family day ministries and a graduate of bullitt east high school. he was preceded in death by his father
column7: billy moore. he is survived by his mother
column10: jordan moore ( amanda) and austin moore; sister
column14: nieces and nephews. his funeral will be 1pm monday at schmid funeral home in mt. washington with burial in highland memory gardens in mt. washington. visitation will be 3-8 pm sunday and after 10am monday.
